newsitem.title: USA: Vicor sues German, Japan firms over patent.
newsitem.headline: Vicor sues German, Japan firms over patent.

text.p: Vicor Corp on Wednesday said it filed a complaint on October 17 in District Court in Munich, Germany, citing Nemic Lambda KK of Japan and Lambda Electronics GmbH for infringement of Vicor's German "reset" patent.
Vicor seeks injunctive relief and damages, the firm said.

The patent protects technology, which can be used to achieve so-called "Zero-Voltage Switching" within a broad spectrum of power conversion topologies, thereby providing improved conversion efficiency and performance.

"Having recently completed a detailed examination of products sold by Lambda in Germany and being confronted with an unresolved case of infringement, Vicor has taken this first step in enforcing its reset patent rights," the firm said in a statement.
Neither defendant could be reached for comment.
